lead_paragraph: Marcus Stout scored 18 points to lead host Fordham past St. Francis of Brooklyn, 76-49, dropping the Terriers to 0-6. Bryant Dunston had 12 points and Sebastian Greene added 11 for the Rams (2-2).
snippet: Marcus Stout scored 18 points to lead host Fordham past St. Francis of Brooklyn, 76-49, dropping the Terriers to 0-6. Bryant Dunston had 12 points and Sebastian Greene added 11 for the Rams (2-2).
